data.actual_result: It shows a notification with no text in the message field.
data.expected_result: It should say the image name as it does for normal notifications.
data.short_description: In-App notifications show a blank message when it's an image without any text.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have In-App Notifications enabled. - Get someone to send you an image without a text. - Observe the notification.
